comments.body:
Hmm, for this benchmark, do we want to fallback to `F2jBLAS`? I think we want to benchmark `VectorizedBLAS` actually.

I saw this benchmark doesn't add cases of native BLAS and vectorized BLAS if they aren't available, but if so, is it useful to run the benchmark?

It's indeed not necessarily helpful to run the benchmark if there is no `VectorizedBLAS` nor `NetblibRefBLAS`/`NetlibSystemBLAS`. However, AFAICT, this benchmark is only run manually and we can then assume that whoever is running it is trying to compare two implementations. If you feel strongly about not running the benchmark if only `F2jBLAS` implementation is available, let me know and I'll modify it to do so.
